desc.sips.empty: Empty. Right-click on an LBA Tank, fluid block, or Cow to fill.
rei.sips.quote0: Twice as much for a nickel!
rei.sips.quote4: Now it's Sips for those who think young!
rei.sips.quote5: Come alive, you're in the Sips generation!
rei.sips.quote6: Taste that beats the others cold. Sips pours it on!
rei.sips.quote7: You've got a lot to live, and Sips's got a lot to give!
rei.sips.quote8: Join the Sips people feeling free!
rei.sips.quote10: Sips's got your taste for life!
rei.sips.quote12: Sips: The choice of a new generation!
rei.sips.quote16: Be young, have fun, drink Sips!
rei.sips.quote20: For those who think young: the joy of Sips!
rei.sips.quote28: You like it, it likes you!
rei.sips.quote33: Put some Sips in your life!
rei.sips.quote37: Be yourself! Be refreshing! Be with Sips!
rei.sips.quote39: Life is good when you take Sips!
rei.sips.quote41: Reach for the sun, reach for a Sip!
rei.sips.quote43: Do you have a little Sip in you?
rei.sips.quote46: There's a bang in every Sip!
